fr.eve.server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The ServerInterface interface declare the remote methods that can be called by the clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String connect()
      Notify the server for a new user on the network.
      void disconnect()
      Notify the server for a user disconnection on the network.
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(Event lastEvent)
      Notify the client of an event.
      byte[] getInitialFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Get the initial file data.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInitialFiles()
      Get the initial files name.
      void notifyEvent(java.lang.String event)
      Notify the client of an event.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        java.lang.String connect()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         AlreadyConnectedException,
                         java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException
        Notify the server for a new user on the network.
        Returns:
        The client ip.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        AlreadyConnectedException - if the user is already connected to the network.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.

      • getInitialFiles

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInitialFiles()
                                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the initial files name.
        Returns:
        Initial files name.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.

      • getInitialFile

        byte[] getInitialFile(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the initial file data.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - The name of the file to download.
        Returns:
        Initial file data, null if the file does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.

      • notifyEvent

        void notifyEvent(java.lang.String event)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException
        Notify the client of an event.
        Parameters:
        event - - Event to notify.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.

      • getEvents

        java.util.List<Event> getEvents(Event lastEvent)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException
        Notify the client of an event.
        Parameters:
        lastEvent - - Event to notify.
        Returns:
        List of new events.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException
        Notify the server for a user disconnection on the network.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.
